import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { ArrowLeft, ShoppingCart, TrendingUp, Users, Target } from 'lucide-react'; const EcommercePlatform: React.FC = () => { const [showBackButton, setShowBackButton] = React.useState(false); React.useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { setShowBackButton(window.scrollY > 100); }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); return (
{/* Floating Back Button */} window.history.back()} className={`fixed top-6 left-6 z-50 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-full p-3 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-200 ${ showBackButton ? 'pointer-events-auto' : 'pointer-events-none' }`} > {/* Hero Section */}
Web Design

E-commerce Platform

Created a seamless shopping experience that increased conversion rates by 35% and improved mobile usability scores.

Sketch InVision A/B Testing Analytics
{/* Project Image */}
{/* Project Details */}
{/* Left Column */}

Project Overview

This e-commerce platform redesign focused on creating a more intuitive and engaging shopping experience for a mid-sized retail brand. The existing website had poor mobile performance and a confusing checkout process that was leading to high cart abandonment rates.

The project involved redesigning the entire user journey from product discovery to checkout completion, with particular emphasis on mobile optimization and reducing friction in the purchasing process.

The new design resulted in a 35% increase in conversion rates and significantly improved mobile usability scores, helping the client achieve their business goals while providing a better experience for customers.

{/* Right Column */}

Key Achievements

35% Increase in Conversion Rates

Streamlined checkout process and improved product presentation led to higher purchase completion rates.

Reduced Cart Abandonment

Simplified checkout flow and transparent pricing reduced cart abandonment by 45%.

Improved Mobile Experience

Mobile-first design approach resulted in 60% better usability scores on mobile devices.
{/* Process Section */}

Design Process

1

User Research

Analyzed user behavior data, conducted interviews with existing customers, and mapped the current user journey to identify pain points.

2

Design & Testing

Created wireframes and prototypes, conducted A/B testing on key elements, and iterated based on user feedback and analytics data.

3

Implementation

Collaborated with development team to implement the design, ensuring pixel-perfect execution and maintaining design consistency.

{/* Key Features */}

Key Features

Smart Product Recommendations

Implemented an AI-powered recommendation system that suggests relevant products based on user browsing history and purchase patterns, increasing average order value by 25%.

One-Click Checkout

Streamlined the checkout process with saved payment methods and address autofill, reducing checkout time from 3 minutes to 30 seconds.

Mobile-First Design

Prioritized mobile experience with touch-friendly interfaces, optimized images, and responsive design that works seamlessly across all devices.

Real-Time Inventory

Integrated real-time inventory tracking with clear availability indicators and back-in-stock notifications to improve customer confidence.

{/* Results & Impact */}

Results & Impact

35%

Conversion Rate Increase

Higher percentage of visitors completing purchases

45%

Cart Abandonment Reduction

Fewer customers leaving without completing checkout

60%

Mobile Usability Improvement

Better user experience on mobile devices
); }; export default EcommercePlatform;
